TextView.android:text: \t\tNote: These are short descriptions of rituals commonly known in-game. Additional rituals exist but you must discover them in game. Many rituals have additional powers beyond those listed in summary!
Creates an Elemental ritual circle, indentifies Elemental magic and offers an elemental Barrier.
Instantly shatters a weapon or shield, so long as it is not legendary.
Creates a magical staff that swings for 5 magic 'type'.
Instantly breaches a target's armour, so long as it is not legendary.
Elemental armour that can be refit with Elemental-type battle magic spell damage.
Like Ethereal Walk, except farther and you get a vulnerability to the opposite element.
Creates a circular trap with differing effects based upon the element chosen.
You can throw small elemental magic-type damage packets at will for a short time.
Doubles numeric Elemental battle magic spell damage for a short time.
Ritual-level defense, it reflects Elemental-type damage to its source.
1/day Investees can pulse Elemental damage if they are in the circle.
Extends the duration of Elemental rituals by 3 months per stack, max 12 months.
Like the battle magic spell, but for Greater Elementals.
People who hear this call are sent crashing to the ground for a short time.
The caster gets to throw 10 Elemental-type packets over the next hour.
1/day a weapon dipped into this bucket gains +0 Magic 'type' aura for a short time.
Allows the caster to add the Ritual prefix to a single Elemental battle magic spell, 1/day.
A magic slow death plus an additional carrier depending on the element chosen.
Investees are immune to certain kinds of Elemental damage while within the circle.
Converts Elemental Magic-type damage into Elemental-type damage for a short time.
Summons a Greater Elemental for 1 hour.
A single large and painful blast of an element.
Grants the target a strong resistance to 1 element, and a vulnerability to the opposite.
Enchant a Master Crafted weapon to deal +0 magic 'Element', can be stacked.
Calls a big rock suffused with an element down from the sky.
Adds 1 year to the duration of Elemental rituals.
1/day Ritual Divine Ward on the circle, note this is 1 per circle, not 1 per investee.
Creates an orb that offers varying buffs to Elemental magic when held.
A big burst of Elemental power that throws the target back with great force.
The target transforms into a powerful Elemental.
Enchants a Master Crafted weapon to swing for +0 Elemental-type damage, can be stacked.
Enchants a cabin-sized area to offer various buffs to Elemental magic used within.
Turns 1/ever Elemental ritual effects into 1/day effects.
Turns everyone inside the circle into a Greater or Lesser Elemental.
Teleports the casters and willing passengers inside the circle to an Elemental plane.
Investees can throw Elemental packets at will while within the circle.
Opens a portal to an Elemental plane.
Turns an Elemental ritual circle into a hoop for easy transport.
A singe huge burst of Elemental damage that can be re-used if it drops the target.
